Author: bakgwei
Title: [ANN][ITO] CRYPTO20, Your first autonomous, tokenised Index Fund.
Body: Interesting point, but how do you calculate that C20 is doing worse than ETH? For me, the diversification into different assets is worth a lot, even if - depending on the time frame you look at - performances will vary. I believe that a basket of tokens will outshine a single investment in the long run (be it C20 or a good DAA from Iconomi etc).

Author: amintek15
Title: [ANN][ITO] CRYPTO20, Your first autonomous, tokenised Index Fund.

Author: bakgwei
Title: [ANN][ITO] CRYPTO20, Your first autonomous, tokenised Index Fund.
Body: OK, I see. Of course there are different strategies fro investing. You will of course always find a coin that outperforms a basket of coins. The trick is to find the right one. So I think that a diversified portfolio will mitigate the risk. C20 for instance performed better than BTC and worse than ETH. If we only knew tehse things beforehand...

Author: amintek15
Title: [ANN][ITO] CRYPTO20, Your first autonomous, tokenised Index Fund.
Body: FROM EMAIL:  ""Announcing our new fund!    Dear CRYPTO20 Community,  Following on from the success of our first fund, CRYPTO20, the worldâ€™s first tokenized cryptocurrency index fund, we are excited to release our first tokenized venture capital fund, Hyperion. The Hyperion white paper is now available for download at invictuscapital.com.    The Invictus Hyperion ICO will begin on 30 April 2018 with a hard cap of 15M USD. Through the IHF (Invictus Hyperion Fund) token, investors gain diversified exposure to a portfolio of expertly-vetted investments in both private and public pre-sales, and ICOs, and will receive quarterly dividend payouts once the fund has doubled in size.  Priority access will be given to both CRYPTO20 ICO investors and current C20 token holders. In the latter case, you will need to prove ownership of at least 500 C20 tokens (using a verification tool being released soon). Visit www.InvictusCapital.com/Hyperion for more information.     Kind regards, The CRYPTO20 Team   If you have any queries, we are here to assist you! You are welcome to join our Discord channel or email us at team@crypto20.com.  Thank you - we look forward to your continued support!""

Author: Board-Room
Title: [ANN][ITO] CRYPTO20, Your first autonomous, tokenised Index Fund.
Body: Serious question if someone is following here.  The current ICO funds are held in BTC, ETH and LTC. Now, assuming the overall market trend is bearish until the end of the ICO would mean that the NAV will be substantially lower (let's say $0.7 than the $1.05 or 1.10 that ICO participants will have to pay for each token.  Would it be unreasonable to assume that, in this case, some ICO participants who assume a prolonged bear trend might want to cut their losses post-ICO and market sell for less than the ICO prices?  What do you guys think? Sensible to hedge your bets and do 50% now and 50% once it hits exchanges?

Author: jules-jules
Title: [ANN][ITO] CRYPTO20, Your first autonomous, tokenised Index Fund.
Body: I am also quite surprised at how little discussion is happening here. The pre-sale ended with almost $5m raised and yet, we're still on page 1 of the ANN.  I think how it compares to Combicoin: Most importantly it only invests in top 20 coins vs top 30, and Crypto20 does rebalancing weekly as opposed to monthly. I think a fairer comparison could be made with http://www.bittwenty.com/, which has been up and running for quite a while already.

Author: Vladdirescu87
Title: [ANN][ITO] CRYPTO20, Your first autonomous, tokenised Index Fund.
Body: CRYPTO20 Set For ICO After Successful $5M Pre-Sale  The minimum fund cap was reached within hours of the pre-sale launch on 7 October 2017.  CRYPTO20â€™s goal is to bring peace-of-mind cryptocurrency investment to mainstream investors. It is an index fund that holds and autonomously rebalances a data science proven portfolio of the top 20 cryptocurrencies.  Actively managed funds have consistently failed to beat the market index despite decades worth of data, billions of dollars and hundreds of analysts at their disposal. When they have, their fees dilute investor returns to less than if they had simply held the index.  Due to rising crypto prices, the fund value per token exceeded the price of tokens being sold. Pre-sale investors were able to acquire $1.10 of underlying crypto assets for $0.95 per token.  The CRYPTO20 pre-sale is now over, with over 2000 backers from 93 countries and $5 million in total funds raised. The main ICO starts on the 16th of October 2017 at 18:00 GMT and ends on the 30th of November at 00:00 GMT.  https://coinidol.com/crypto20-set-for-ico-after-successful-pre-sale/
